roleset.name: impale
roleset.note: GORE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gore' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison. (from gore.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passivized, no instrument
example.text: ``[Wall Street 's cash cow]-1 has been gored *trace*-1, but I don't think anyone has proven that index arbitrage is the problem.''
